Title: The Fourth Seat
Description:
With me da' and Anduin weakened and Alleria nowhere to be found, it's up to us, $n, to clear the way for Thrall an' Jaina's army if we hope tae strike back at the nerubians an' Xal'atath.

But we cannae get to the nerubians without the Coreway. An' we cannae repair the Coreway without the earthen's help.

If Merrix thinks this Adelgonn an' her "Unbound" are the only ones that can fix the Coreway, then we need tae find her.

Time tae sharpen me smile an' put on me diplomat hat. Are ye with me, $n?
ObjectivesText: Find Adelgonn in Freywold Village in the Isle of Dorn.
CompletionText: If you are with Baelgrim, then the Council and Oathsworn must have accepted you onto our land.
RewardText: It seems I have little choice but to hear you and Baelgrim out.

Objectives.Text: Regroup with Baelgrim at the top of Foundation Hall
